mapper.insert: insert into smart_journals ( TRANSACTION_ID, SESSION_ID, DEVICE_ID, TRCODE, USER_ID, TIME_STAMP, JOURNAL_TYPE, JOURNAL_RESULT, ERROR_CODE, ERROR_TEXT, INFO_TEXT, SERVER_IP, CLIENT_IP, CREATE_DATE ) values( #{transactionId,mode=IN,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sessionId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trCode,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,mode=IN,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{type,mode=IN,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{result,mode=IN,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{errorCode,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorText,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoText,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverIP,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientIP,mode=IN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW() )
